about_the_game:
Welcome to Star Garden!

Embark on an unforgettable journey where you’ll team up with powerful creatures called Lumi to uncover the secrets of a mysterious world waiting to be discovered.

Features

Single-Player Story Mode

Leo and Lyra, cosmic ecologists on a mission to study new ecosystems, find themselves stranded on Solaris—a vibrant, uncharted planet filled with incredible life forms. Their crash landing leads to an extraordinary encounter with the Lumi, unique creatures whose abilities may hold the key to survival.

  • Raise, customize and evolve your Lumi to unlock their full potential.

  • Explore Venture Fields, teeming with Lumi villages, hidden areas, and untold secrets.

  • Piece together the mysteries of Solaris and decide the fate of its people—and your own.

Will you return to the stars, or will Solaris change your path forever?

Local & Online Multiplayer Battle Mode

Challenge yourself and others in CosmiClash, where quick thinking and strategy lead to victory.

  • Play locally with up to four players or online with up to six.

  • Start with a base Lumi, collect items to boost their abilities, and outsmart your opponents.

  • Navigate unpredictable events that keep every match exciting and dynamic.

  • Adapt, strategize, and prove your skills in this competitive multiplayer experience.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Star Garden!

Embark on an unforgettable journey where you’ll team up with powerful creatures called Lumi to uncover the secrets of a mysterious world waiting to be discovered.

Features

Single-Player Story Mode

Leo and Lyra, cosmic ecologists on a mission to study new ecosystems, find themselves stranded on Solaris—a vibrant, uncharted planet filled with incredible life forms. Their crash landing leads to an extraordinary encounter with the Lumi, unique creatures whose abilities may hold the key to survival.

  • Raise, customize and evolve your Lumi to unlock their full potential.

  • Explore Venture Fields, teeming with Lumi villages, hidden areas, and untold secrets.

  • Piece together the mysteries of Solaris and decide the fate of its people—and your own.

Will you return to the stars, or will Solaris change your path forever?

Local & Online Multiplayer Battle Mode

Challenge yourself and others in CosmiClash, where quick thinking and strategy lead to victory.

  • Play locally with up to four players or online with up to six.

  • Start with a base Lumi, collect items to boost their abilities, and outsmart your opponents.

  • Navigate unpredictable events that keep every match exciting and dynamic.

  • Adapt, strategize, and prove your skills in this competitive multiplayer experience.

name: Star Garden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final and are subject to change before release.

short_description: Dive into an electrifying single-player story or take on thrilling multiplayer battles with up to four players locally or six online. Star Garden brings creature collection, exploration, and fast-paced action to life in stunning, dynamic worlds. Your interstellar adventure awaits!
